again..nth to do so come lor..mi sort of still thinking of that guy ZW lor..haha maybe got some regret bout the sms to him lor..maybe can say more thingz wan..just because of he forget to bring back his phone and she saw it ..hao le lahhh all this is past and now still dreaming and waiting for me next dreamz guy lor..honestly la he is the second person who told me like me lor..first is my god brother's best buddy but i did not say anything lor ..second is ZW lor...boring sia...never mind lor anyway wo xiang xin yuan fen haha maybe too childish but i still think that zi ruan jiu hao like how those pathetic two guys say they like me...but i think my korkor friend wan more cute..that was about last year bah mi,korkor and other of his friend also my korkor whahaha were working together as giving away flyers house to house that was really tiring lor..then when we sat down and chatted korkor show me a message bout the guy who like me sms him and told my korkor that he like me lor and if i not wrong should be 'i like her' then i think he got sms lor saying that they are joking then later say is real one cause he did not want me to aviod him when i saw him..but now we still got contact lah..my another korkor too ! ! mi got quite lot of korkor lor they dote me a lot wan mi when got problem will look for them kanna bully also they will help me wan,sometime i wanna buy thing then too expensive or no money they will buy for me wan sometime go out with them mood gd rite will surely buy thing for me wan ..meimei le got few ,but there one whom i dote alot i never see her before because of one person WANGRENFU make us best sister sia,she also veri cute wan aiyo love her can liao* not les. hor is sister love* ,got see her picture she also got see mine before la jiejie also got few lor but not that close..didi hor have also ..but after all still prefer korkor ...haha! did exactly fall in love with one of my korkor but too but he got stead liao the day become his meimiei got tell him before that i last time like him then he bhb say of course lor i so handsome ...*feel like vomiting lor* he really a handsome and cute guy...hAhAz!aiyo to me now zi ruan jiu hao is the best liao..is now got stead rite i surely die lor,my sis will scold real sister mother also they knoe onil say study study no need to gos teady at this age lor...and hor is liking a idol a wrong..just becuase my result not veri gd they say i like 5566 too much la everything 5566 ar wangrenfu yes i agree i like them a lot everyting thme but i knoe mylimt study is study 5566 is 5566 but sometime like studying for exams or test rite scared don't knoe rite ye shi yin wei 5566 er jiayou de just like my literature and history although get 50 marks onil but i can passed because of them ma when doing the paper i almost give uop but i think that 5566 i suddenly worked harder le , why because they say before they don't wish the fans because of them neglect their study so i do finished lor..lucky lucky passed ! love 5566 sia ...ok le stop here maybe tonite then continue .... - wu liao g3Rl
